full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 745 Filed 08/10/22 Page 129 of 264 540 LC1Qmax4 Jane - Cross 1 Q. Were there allegations that you were a Yugoslavian sex slave that you saw on the internet? 2 MS. MODE: Objection to relevance, your Honor. 3 MS. MENNINGER: I'm asking if she saw the press? 4 THE COURT: I'll allow it. 5 6 A. I don't remember reading that. 7 Q. You wanted to stop the press about you, right? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. So you hired an attorney? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. And that was around 2015? 12 A. Yes, I think so. 13 Q. You hired a litigator, a tough litigator, right? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. You paid her a lot of money? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. Quarter of a million dollars? 18 A. No. 19 Q. Do you recall speaking with the government in December of 2019? 20 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. I'm sorry, got that date wrong. September 2 of 2021, so a few months ago? 23 24 A. Yes. 25 Q. At that time, you said you gave this litigator a quarter of SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012149
